Title: Requires public school districts to carry opioid antagonists and to require training for staff in the administration of opioid antagonists
Summary: Requires public school districts to carry opioid antagonists and to require training for staff in the administration of opioid antagonists.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring public school districts to carry opioid antagonists and to require training for staff in the administration of opioid antagonists
